#summary The roadmap for the project
#labels Phase-Design

This is an overview of the releases, and the planned features for each release.

== Version 0.1 ==

 * [QueryMegasquirt Query the megasquirt] and log key (raw) metrics via a serial connection.
 * [LogToSerial Log directly to (usb) serial port]
 * [LogToCard Log directly to SD storage]
 * [QueryLIS331 Query accelerometer] for 3 axis g valued
 * [QueryGPS Query a GPS] for speed, and location

== Near Term ==

 * [QueryVRSensor Query VR sensors] for wheel rpm.
 * [QueryYaw Query yaw sensors] for yaw, roll and pitch.
 * [QueryResistance Query one or more resistance based values]
 * [QueryDigitalIO Query one or more digital inputs/outputs]

== Long Term ==

 * Bluetooth interface to iphone/android to download and view on thie fly.
